entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
